claim:
Result
A collective decision was reached to include 17 articles as the foundational basis for the final set of guidelines (Figure 1).
title: Figure 1.
caption: PRISMA (Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses) flow diagram of the articles selection process.
